name: gxf1
description:
A short narrative game made during Ludum Dare 41.

The theme being "Combine two incompatible genres", gxf1 blends a typical chess simulation with a narrative structure heavily reminiscent of visual novels. The twist : you are a pawn trying to survive in the midst of the board...

HTML5 version (Recent Chrome and Firefox versions) : https://jlv_.gitlab.io/gxf1/
